attributes.action: Calling for a vote of no confidence, in the Prime Minster over migrant relief.
attributes.background: For months the David Cameron has said no, to opening up the UK to migrants. However this week he has u-turned, in fact offered £100 million in relief. Totalling 1.1 billion now. We have no legal nor moral responsibilies to these migrants. Safe countries are crossed before they arrive in the UK.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107442

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
